channel.title: Life Lofranco
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Setting things up
item.description:
Hello World!

Finally! I'm done configuring everything. Setting this site up took a while since I am still working my way on blogging in Jekyll. I think I am starting to figure out how everything works, but I'm sure I have a long way until I totally understand everything. Thankfully, Jekyll's documentation is easy enough to understand and there are plenty of resources online. :D

I've always wanted to start a blog way back, but then life always seems to get in the way. I came across this article that pushed me to start writing. (You should read it too.) I guess you can say that it was inspiration that prompted me to start my blog. I just hope this inspiration doesn't go away anytime soon lol. Also because of my newfound determination, I also bought my first domain today. Funny story when I bought this domain, my credit card got charged twice. I had to talk with their customer service to ask for a refund. Haha

So what's the purpose of this blog? Well, to document my life of course. I hope I can write just about everything that matters to me. I am also planning to blog about all my entreprenurial journeys and write about software and code. Time to share my knowledge to the world. Haha Since I also easily forget a lot of things, this blog can also serve as my online notes. I hope I can update this blog continuously!

Cheers!
